markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 318 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Nymph](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=12)

**Deities**
[Bastet](/Deities.aspx?ID=50), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=54), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=110), [Tanagaar](/Deities.aspx?ID=129)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 animal
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You tap into the target's senses, allowing you to see, hear, and otherwise sense whatever it senses for the spell's duration. If the target wishes to prevent you from doing so, it can attempt a Will save, negating the spell on a success, but most animals don't bother to do so. While tapping into the target's senses, you can't use your own body's senses, but you can change back and forth from your body's senses to the target's senses using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.
name: Animal Vision

</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Project your senses through an animal.
</summary>
summary: Project your senses through an animal.
summary_markdown: Project your senses through an animal.
text: Animal Vision Source Core Rulebook pg. 318 4.0 Tradition Primal Bloodline Nymph Deities Bastet, Isis, Ketephys, Tanagaar Cast 1 minute (material, somatic, verbal) Range 120 feet Target 1 animal Duration 1 hour --- You tap into the target's senses, allowing you to see, hear, and otherwise sense whatever it senses for the spell's duration. If the target wishes to prevent you from doing so, it can attempt a Will save, negating the spell on a success, but most animals don't bother to do so. While tapping into the target's senses, you can't use your own body's senses, but you can change back and forth from your body's senses to the target's senses using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.
